name: Global Virtual Summit on World Nursing
content: World Nursing Meet 2021 is an International platform to adverse and study about the early detection as well as treatment care based on Professional standards, and intense research on whole Nursing. The conference contains significant international experts in Scientists, Doctors, Nurses, research scholars and general practitioners, Student Delegates and Exhibitors form all over the world to our webinar with the theme “The Future of Nursing: Navigating Beyond the Horizon”. Webinar will be featuring oral presentations, poster presentations, keynote talks, workshops and many more.
